== Making small changes ==
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
=== Changing text ===

* x == dl
* X == dh
* D == d$
* C == c$
* s == cl
* S == cc

=== Visual mode ===

* o, O change end

=== Text objects ===

* aw, iw
* as, is
* ap, ip
* a包括后面的空格，i不包括

== Set your settings ==

== Using syntax highlighting ==

== Editing more than one file ==
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
=== A list of files ===

* :next，:next! 编辑参数列表中下一个文件
* :wnext == :w + :next
* :args 列出所有文件
* :previous, :previous!, :wprevious
* :last, :first
* :args x x x 编辑x, x, x

=== Jumping from file to file ===

* CTRL-^ 返回上一个编辑的文件
* `" 返回离开文件时光标所在处
* `. 返回上一次改动的位置
* m[A-Z] 跨文件mark

=== Viewing a file ===

* vim -R file
* view file (UNIX)

=== Changing the file name ===

* :saveas xxx 文件另存为xxx，之后:w写入的是xxx
* :file yyy ???

== Splitting windows ==
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
=== Split a window ===

* CTRL-W w 返回刚才编辑的窗口
* :close 关闭当前窗口
* :only 只保留当前窗口

=== Split a window on another file ===

* :new, :vnew 在新窗口打开一个新的空白文件

=== Window size ===

* :{number}split xxx number为新窗口的宽/高
* CTRL-W +/- 调节窗口大小
* {number}CTRL-W _ 设置窗口大小为number

=== Vertical splits ===

* CTRL-W h/j/k/l/t/b 在窗口间移动

=== Moving windows ===

* CTRL-w H/J/K/L

=== Viewing differences with vimdiff ===

* vimdiff xxx yyy(shell)
* zo 打开fold
* zc 关闭fold
* :diffsplit xxx
* [c 上一改变
* ]c 下一改变
* :diffupdate 更新高亮
* dp 用当前内容覆盖更改内容
* do 用未更改内容覆盖当前内容

=== Tab pages ===

* :tabedit xxx
* gt, gT
* :tab split
* :tab+任何打开窗口的命令
* :tabonly

== Using the GUI ==

== Making big changes ==
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
=== Record and playback commands ===

* {
*   q{register}
*   commands
*   q
* }
* @{register}
* q[A-Z] 往寄存器中追加命令
* "[A-Z]{op} 往寄存器中追加内容

=== Substitution ===

* :[range]s/from/to/[flags]

=== The global command ===

* :[range]global/{pattern}/{command}(command为:命令)

=== Reading and writing part of a file ===

* :r filename 将filename的内容插入到光标下
* :[range]r filename 将filename的内容插入到range下
* :[range]w filename 将range包含的内容写入到filename中
* :w >> filename 追加

=== Formatting text ===

* gq{motion} 根据textwidth选项格式化文本

=== Using an external program ===

* !{motion}{program} == program < {motion} > {motion}(shell)
* :{range}!{program} == program < {range} > {range}
* :r !{program} 将program的输出插入到光标下
* :w !{program} == program < :w(shell)
* CTRL-L 重绘屏幕

== Recovering from a crash ==

    vim -r(shell)

== Clever tricks ==
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
=== Change "Last, First" to "First Last" ===

* :%s/\([^,]*\), \(.*\)/\2 \1/

=== Reverse line order ===

* :g/^/m 0

=== Count words ===

* g CTRL-G

=== Find a man page ===

* K 在shell中打开光标下单词的man
* 加了man.vim插件后：
*   :Man xxx 在新窗口打开xxx的man
*   \K 在新窗口打开光标下单词的man

=== Trim blanks ===

* :%s/\s\+$//

=== Find where a word is used ===

* vim `grep -l xxx yyy`(shell)

= Editing Effectively =
==============================================================================
== Typing command-line commands quickly ==
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
=== Command line window ===

* q: 在新窗口打开命令历史

== Go away and come back ==
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
=== Executing shell commands ===

* :!command

=== Remembering information; viminfo ===

* viminfo记录了
*   Command-line and Search pattern history
*   Text in registers
*   Marks for various files
*   The buffer list
*   Global variables

* '0 回到上次离开vim时的状态
* :oldfiles 显示最近编辑过的文件
* :e #<2 编辑上面显示的第二个文件
* :split #<3 你懂的
* :browse oldfiles 列出最近编辑文件
* :wviminfo! xxx
* :rviminfo! xxx

=== Sessions ===

* session记录的内容由sessionoptions选项决定

* :mksession vimbook.vim 创建session文件
* :source vimbook.vim 读取session文件
* vim -S vimbook.vim 启动时读取session文件

=== Views ===

* view相当于一个窗口的session

* :mkview [1-9] 创建view文件
* :loadview [1-9] 读取view文件
* :mkview xxx
* :loadview xxx

== Finding the file to edit ==

* :cd  同UNIX的cd，作用到所有非独特窗口
* :pwd  同UNIX的pwd
* :lcd  当前窗口独特的目录切换

* gf  查找光标下文件，查找路径由path选项配置
